variable.name: HOS4A
variable.description: Did you receive the associated hospital chart?

variable.name: HOS6B
variable.description: Time of arrival at hospital: AM/PM

variable.name: HOS8
variable.description: What was the disposition of the patient on discharge? {If Deceased, complete Death Certification Form}

variable.name: HOS9
variable.description: Are any causes of death given on the discharge summary?

variable.name: HOS10
variable.description: Was the patient transferred from another hospital?

variable.name: HOS12
variable.description: Was the patient admitted for a CHD diagnosis and/or symptoms of CHD?

variable.name: HOS12A
variable.description: Estimated time from onset of acute cardiac symptoms to arrival at this hospital

variable.name: HOS13
variable.description: Was there mention of an acute CHD event with onset after arrival at the hospital?

variable.name: HOS13B
variable.description: Did this CHD event occur following a surgical procedure?

variable.name: HOS14
variable.description: Was there an acute episode(s) of discomfort or pain anywhere in the chest, left arm or jaw, within 72 hours prior to arrival or in conjunction with the in-hospital CHD event?

variable.name: HOS14B
variable.description: Did this pain include the chest?

variable.name: HOS14C
variable.description: Did the patient take nitrates at the time of the acute episode?

variable.name: HOS14E
variable.description: Was the discomfort or pain diagnosed as having a non-cardiac origin?

variable.name: HOS14FA
variable.description: If Yes (discomfort or pain diagnosed as having a non-cardiac origin), specify:

variable.name: HOS15A
variable.description: Shock: Was shock mentioned as being present at: Home

variable.name: HOS15B
variable.description: Shock: Was shock mentioned as being present at: Hospital emergency room

variable.name: HOS15C
variable.description: Shock: Was shock mentioned as being present at: During hospital stay

variable.name: HOS16A
variable.description: Congestive heart failure: Was CHF mentioned as being present: On arrival or in ER

variable.name: HOS16B
variable.description: Congestive heart failure: Was CHF mentioned as being present: During hospital stay

variable.name: HOS17
variable.description: Did the patient receive resuscitation for cardiac collapse including electrical cardioversion and CPR resuscitation?

variable.name: HOS17A
variable.description: Did the patient have coronary bypass surgery during this hospitalization?

variable.name: HOS17B
variable.description: Did the patient have a coronary angioplasty and/or stent during this hospitalization?

variable.name: HOS18
variable.description: Were any cardiac enzymes reported within days 1-4 after arrival at the hospital or after in-hospital CHD event?

variable.name: HOS19
variable.description: Is there mention of patient having trauma or rhabdomyolysis within one week prior to measurement of enzymes?

variable.name: HOS20
variable.description: Did the patient have any cardiac surgical procedures during the hospitalization prior to measurement of enzymes?

variable.name: HOS21
variable.description: Is there any evidence of hemolytic disease?

variable.name: HOS22
variable.description: First occurring enzymes: Were samples drawn?

variable.name: HOS22C1
variable.description: CK-MB - Is the value reported in:

variable.name: HOS22EA1
variable.description: Troponin I - Is the value reported in:

variable.name: HOS22EB1
variable.description: Troponin T - Is the value reported in:

variable.name: HOS22I1
variable.description: LDH1 - Is the value reported in:

variable.name: HOS22K1
variable.description: LDH2 - Is the value reported in:

variable.name: HOS23
variable.description: Second occurring enzymes: Were samples drawn?

variable.name: HOS24
variable.description: Third occurring enzymes: Were samples drawn?

variable.name: HOS25
variable.description: Fourth occurring enzymes: Were samples drawn?

variable.name: HOS26
variable.description: Fifth occurring enzymes: Were samples drawn?

variable.name: VISIT
variable.description: Visit number based on follow-up time

variable.name: HOS22FA
variable.description: Upper Limit of Normal - Troponin I:

variable.name: HOS22FB
variable.description: Upper Limit of Normal - Troponin T:

variable.name: HOS22H
variable.description: Total LDH - Upper Limit of Normal:

variable.name: HOS27A
variable.description: Were there any ECGs taken during this admission?

variable.name: HOS29
variable.description: Was there a second ECG after the one above?

variable.name: HOS31
variable.description: Was there a third ECG after the two above?

variable.name: HOS33
variable.description: Was a new MI identified by any of the three ECGs?

variable.name: HOS34
variable.description: Was the patient admitted for a stroke diagnosis and/or symptoms of stroke?

variable.name: HOS35
variable.description: Was there mention of an acute stroke event with onset after arrival at the hospital?

variable.name: HOS35B
variable.description: Did this stroke event occur following a surgical procedure?

variable.name: HOS35C
variable.description: Did the patient receive Nitrous Oxide (NO) anesthesia?

variable.name: HOS36
variable.description: Did new neurological symptoms develop during this hospitalization?

variable.name: HOS38A
variable.description: Was cerebral angiography performed during this hospitalization?

variable.name: HOS40
variable.description: Code number of person completing this form:

variable.name: HOS4B
variable.description: Have you exhausted all possibilities to get the associated hospital chart?

variable.name: HOS38C
variable.description: Was a CT or MRI performed during this hospitalization?

variable.name: O_VISIT
variable.description: Indicates the visit number used for selecting study forms or central laboratory data

variable.name: HOS5FUT
variable.comment: Number of days since randomization.

variable.name: HOS13CFT
variable.comment: Number of days since randomization.

variable.name: HOS22MFT
variable.comment: Number of days since randomization.

variable.name: HOS23GFT
variable.comment: Number of days since randomization.

variable.name: HOS24GFT
variable.comment: Number of days since randomization.

variable.name: HOS25GFT
variable.comment: Number of days since randomization.

variable.name: HOS26GFT
variable.comment: Number of days since randomization.

variable.name: HOS7FUT
variable.description: Date of discharge (for nonfatal cases) or death:
variable.comment: Number of days since randomization.

variable.name: HOS30FUT
variable.description: Date of the second ECG for this admission:
variable.comment: Number of days since randomization.

variable.name: HOS32FUT
variable.description: Date of the third ECG for this admission:
variable.comment: Number of days since randomization.

variable.name: HOS39FUT
variable.comment: Number of days since randomization.

variable.name: HOS13AFT
variable.comment: Number of days since randomization.

variable.name: HOS14AFT
variable.comment: Number of days since randomization.

variable.name: HOS28BFT
variable.description: Date of the first ECG after in-hospital onset of suspect CHD, or date of the first ECG for this admission:
variable.comment: Number of days since randomization.

variable.name: HOS35AFT
variable.comment: Number of days since randomization.

variable.name: HOS35DFT
variable.comment: Number of days since randomization.

variable.name: HOS37AFT
variable.description: Date of onset of new neurological symptoms:
variable.comment: Number of days since randomization.

variable.name: HOS38BFT
variable.comment: Number of days since randomization.

variable.name: HOS38C1F
variable.comment: Number of days since randomization.

variable.name: HOS38C2F
variable.comment: Number of days since randomization.

variable.name: HOS38C3F
variable.comment: Number of days since randomization.

variable.name: HOS38C4F
variable.comment: Number of days since randomization.

variable.name: HOS38C5F
variable.comment: Number of days since randomization.

variable.name: HOS9AFT
variable.description: Record the cause(s) of death: first line
variable.comment: Codes are formatted variables created from original ICD codes that are collapsed into categories. The first two digits indicate the category of the condition; the digits after the decimal point were created for statistical center usage only.

variable.name: HOS9BFT
variable.description: Record the cause(s) of death: second line
variable.comment: Codes are formatted variables created from original ICD codes that are collapsed into categories. The first two digits indicate the category of the condition; the digits after the decimal point were created for statistical center usage only.

variable.name: HOS9CFT
variable.description: Record the cause(s) of death: third line
variable.comment: Codes are formatted variables created from original ICD codes that are collapsed into categories. The first two digits indicate the category of the condition; the digits after the decimal point were created for statistical center usage only.

variable.name: HOS9DFT
variable.description: Record the cause(s) of death: fourth line
variable.comment: Codes are formatted variables created from original ICD codes that are collapsed into categories. The first two digits indicate the category of the condition; the digits after the decimal point were created for statistical center usage only.
